name: Sanctuary of Repose
desc: This retreat offers a much needed respite from the stresses of interstellar chivalry.

name: Battlestation Liba
desc:
A warship-turned-battlestation, augmented with heavy ablative armor and overlapping defense modules.

Must be reduced before a bombardment can be attempted.

name: Battlestar Libra
desc:
A glorious, restored battlestar sporting a truly intimidating level of firepowerand an extensive minefield.

Must be reduced before a bombardment can be attempted
